summary: This is an email chain from April 5, 2019, between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel, discussing scheduling a meeting with 'the brass' to update them on the Epstein case and discuss timetable/plan. The emails are brief and logistical.

events.title: Meeting with 'the brass' to discuss Epstein case
events.description: A meeting scheduled for Monday at noon to update senior officials ('the brass') on the Epstein case and discuss timetable/plan.

keyFacts: Email chain dated April 5, 2019, regarding scheduling a meeting about the Epstein case.
Meeting purpose was to update senior officials ('the brass') and discuss 'timetable/plan' for the case.
All sender/recipient names are redacted, appearing as placeholders like '(USANYS)' or blank fields.
Correspondence is between personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
